00020 JMA_CType* JMA_CType::instance(Knowledge::EncodeType type)
00021 {
00022     switch(type)
00023     {
00024         case Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP:
00025             return JMA_CType_EUCJP::instance();
00026 
00027         case Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS:
00028             return JMA_CType_SJIS::instance();
00029 
00030         case Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8:
00031             return JMA_CType_UTF8::instance();
00032 
00033         default:
00034             assert(false && "Unknown character encode type");
00035             return 0;
00036     }
00037 }

00043 size_t JMA_CType::length(const char* p) const
00044 {
00045     size_t ret = 0;
00046     while(p)
00047     {
00048         unsigned int len = getByteCount(p);
00049         //len can be 0
00050         if(!len)
00051             return ret;
00052         p += len;
00053         ++ret;
00054     }
00055     return ret;
00056 }
